comments:
I'm using IBM WebSphere Studio Application Developer v4.0.3 on a Windows 2000 
machine. I can't seem to start WSAD's built-in WebSphere test environment due 
to an underlying error from Eclipse.  Any suggestions?

What version of Eclipse is being used? Is this actually an R1.0 bug (as noted 
in the "version" above?

Looking at the 2.1 code, it looks NPE safe. Closing this bug (appears to be a 
1.0 bug report, which is no longer supported).
